record.title: ADJOURNMENT UNTIL MONDAY, SEPTEMBER 10, 2007, AT 10 A.M.
record.narrative:
ADJOURNMENT UNTIL MONDAY, SEPTEMBER 10, 2007, AT 10 A.M. -- (Senate - September 07, 2007)

[Page: S11281]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, if there is no further business today, I ask unanimous consent that the Senate stand adjourned under the previous order.

record.narrative: There being no objection, the Senate, at 12:29 p.m., adjourned until Monday, September 10, 2007, at 10 a.m.
